content: I probably should get my act together and actually read and study SICP.
title: Berni's adventures in SICPland

content: About me I am Bernardino, and I am a JOATMON (Jack Of All Trades, Master of None) from Milan, Italy. Trained as a philosopher, I work as a management consultant. I am: insatiably curious unhealthily restless, and a voracious learner. I occasionally write about artificial intelligence and computer science. You can read my articles on Â  Medium.
